description: Hajime and Ryuji`s Father`s Exploud was sent out to test Ryuji and Hajime and it was told to lie in wait for them in the forest. The two brother`s teamed up to battle it and it was their father`s hope that working together to battle Bakuong would remind them of previous battles they had together. The plan worked and through their battle with Bakuong they were reminded that closeness is their family`s treasure.
name: Bakuong (Hajime to Ryuuji no Chichioya)
